      • Versus

        Rick and Morty VS. South Park

        Is South Park or Rick and Morty the king of crass - and ingeniously satirical - primetime toons? In order to make the decision, we pit Matt Stone and Trey Parker's long-running and crudely animated series against Dan Harmon and Justin Roiland's surreal four-season phenom across a number of battle rounds!
